name: Writing Archimedes
tagline: The Archimedes project at Holy Cross, 2013-14
body:
### The Project

The Archimedes team at Holy Cross is presently examining two texts of Archimedes: the tenth century Codex C as preserved in the Archimedes Palimpsest, and the sixteenth century Codex Bodmer 8.  This year's project will compare *On the Sphere and Cylinder* as it is preserved in each codex.

### Codex C

(background)

#### *On the Sphere and Cylinder* in Codex C

The following are links to the folios in the Archimedes Palimpsest which offer the text of *On the Sphere and Cylinder*.

45r: [no-veil](http://amphoreus.hpcc.uh.edu/tomcat/chsimg/Img?request=GetIIPMooViewer&urn=urn:cite:ap:apimg.109r-106v_Arch45r_Sinar_pseudo_no-veil) | [sharpie](http://amphoreus.hpcc.uh.edu/tomcat/chsimg/Img?request=GetIIPMooViewer&urn=urn:cite:ap:apimg.109r-106v_Arch45r_Sinar_pseudo_sharpie) | [Heiberg](http://amphoreus.hpcc.uh.edu/tomcat/chsimg/Img?request=GetIIPMooViewer&urn=urn:cite:ap:apimg.109r-106v_Arch45r_Heiberg_visible_stitch)
